titleStmt.title: His Highness Prince Rupert's letter to the Earl of Arlington, His Majesties principal secretary of state from on board the Royal Charles off the Osterbank, the XXIXth of May, 1673, distant from East Capel Seven Leagues, at one of the clock afternoon, the wind s.s.w.
titleStmt.author: Rupert, Prince, Count Palatine, 1619-1682.
Arlington, Henry Bennet, Earl of, 1618-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
